title: What if Riven didn't kill the Elder!?

replies.body: Nah only way Janna can kill something is with Ignite, and he wasnt killed by fire.
Maybe {{champion:157}} put a wind wall in front of the Elder's car on the highway.
He planned it all!

What if the elder was the one who taught Yasuo the wind techniques and just made it LOOK like he died because Yasuo didn't get his coffee quickly enough the other day and wanted to get back at him?

What if the elder faked his death and is still alive, finally living out his dreams of dressing like Frank Sinatra and playing the saxophone at a cabaret in Piltover?
Or it could be someone not in the institute of war. Seriously, not everyone in runeterra is a champion..... -_-
Even the fucking cockroaches and little shitty frogs

Day 72 post nuke incident:
the cockroaches now have adapted and have begun to learn how to airbend.

But remember, there is no institute of war anymore 

There is no League of Legends in League of Legends :^)
Nerp https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=78XNwwK8Bzw
**X FILES THEME**

{{champion:157}} taunts {{champion:92}} 
"Wait, that technique.... huh,"
"Huh, three swift strikes..."
"Another win blade?"
"Who taught you that?"

{{champion:157}} "You can't run from yourself, Riven... I've tried."

but yea, Janna is possible. Or anyone.

We all know it was {{champion:83}}...
...
...
...
He seriously blows.
For 2.95 a minute, janna was leaving him breathless, but the breathlessness was caused by an erotic asphyxiation disaster.
It was Bard. It's always Bard.

What if Riven IS the elder?

She has white hair after all.

I'll leave the rest up to your imagination. Fan-fic group, you're up.
full ap janna gg, get rekt noob elder
no pls have mercy {{champion:26}}

It was obviously Old Karma guys. duh...

Janna taught her wind techniques with her fans.
wind technique, not wind magic.  Janna didn't do it.
